Jordan army says guards injured, weapons seized in clashes along Syrian borderJordan's army on Monday said it had seized weapons and drugs after clashes with armed drug dealers along the Syrian border at dawn, and officials said the gunmen were linked to pro-Iranian militias seeking to undermine the country's security. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 08:11:54 GMT B6VK5DV7B5L73KWUI3RCKMFUAU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordan-army-says-guards-injured-weapons-seized-clashes-along-syrian-border-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
Indonesian transgender models shine spotlight on pollution with plastic fashionDeep in the slums of Jakarta, a transgender community is using fashion to raise awareness about their lives and the environment in this densely populated, polluted city. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 08:09:28 GMT D2SXZO7Y3VM6RD7CFL64J5GRTE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesian-transgender-models-shine-spotlight-pollution-with- Plastic-fashion-2023-12-18/Zahra Matarani世界亚太地区
Eviction, threats and suicidal thoughts: Uganda's LGBT community endures trying yearAs a Ugandan court hears a challenge on Monday to one of the world's harshest anti-LGBT laws, there's more at stake than the simple constitutionality of the statute. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 08:08:14 GMT O4AIY76ATZNG3IWJD57QL4VJR4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/eviction-threats-suicidal-thoughts-ugandas-lgbt-community-endures-trying-year-2023-12-18/Reuters世界非洲
Kenya, EU advance economic partnership agreement to boost tradeKenya and the European Union moved closer to sealing an Economic Partnership Agreement that will grant the East African nation's exports duty-free status and unlimited access to the bloc, officials said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 08:01:30 GMT QVM7PWYPIJPTPARH2IEJ5BCABA https://www.reuters.com/world/kenya-eu-advance-economic-partnership-agreement-boost-trade-2023-12-18/Reuters世界
Software problem disrupts Iranian gas stations -FarsDisruptions to several gas stations across Iran and in Tehran in particular appear to have been caused by a software problem, the semi-official Fars news agency reported on Monday, without providing further detail. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:54:02 GMT NPTQJCW33BN7PGORDVRYTJY7L4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/software-problem-disrupts-iranian-gas-stations-fars-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
Explainer: What are solid-fuel missiles, and why is North Korea developing them?North Korea test-fired a intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) powered by solid fuel on Monday, South Korean officials said, in what would be the third such test this year to boost capabilities for launching with little preparation. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:32:18 GMT M6JIJMQTIBJ6JAQ2BHQCJGV2KA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/what-are-solid-fuel-missiles-why-is-north-korea-developing-them-2023-12-18/Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
US sees no impact on Vietnam ties from Hanoi-Beijing defence pledgesThe United States will continue to closely cooperate with Vietnam, a U.S. official said after Hanoi announced last week strengthened ties with China, including on defence and security, as the two great powers compete for influence. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:14:56 GMT 5DYO2KLW7FJBNEJF3RU735K6LQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us-sees-no-impact-vietnam-ties-hanoi-beijing-defence-pledges-2023-12-18/Francesco Guarascio世界
Cash-strapped Congolese eye deep inequalities ahead of voteFive years after graduating with a diploma in computer network maintenance, Georges Bamue, 27, still navigates the streets of Democratic Republic of Congo's capital as a motorcycle taxi rider, unable to find a job or raise enough to start a business in his trained field. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 07:07:22 GMT RMOWXRMPE5KSDLDCH2VM7KQ5JA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/cash-strapped-congolese-eye-deep-inequalities-ahead-vote-2023-12-18/Ange Kasongo, Sonia Rolley世界非洲
Rare snowfall in southern China as deep freeze grips the northThe cold weather sweeping China brought rare snowfall on Monday as far south as the province of Guangdong, while temperatures in the chilly north plunged to near historic lows for the month. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:56:26 GMT AMGPOTNINFIDNJSSC4RSI2CXUI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/rare-snowfall-southern-china-deep-freeze-grips-north-2023-12-18/Liz Lee, Ryan Woo世界中国
UKMTO, Ambrey: report of possible explosion south of Yemen's port of MokhaA possible explosion near a vessel in the vicinity of Bab al-Mandab Strait, 30 nautical miles south of Yemen's port of Mokha, was reported on Monday by the United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operation (UKMTO) and the British maritime security firm Ambrey. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:47:11 GMT 6HRYZOY63VKFHLEXGHGXBHQMQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/ukmto-ambrey-report-possible-explosion-south-yemens-port-mokha-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
Where is democracy headed in 2024? Trump may have the final wordRussia's Vladimir Putin looks set to remain in power until at least 2030; India's Narendra Modi seems certain to extend his rule to 2029; and Donald Trump could return to the White House despite charges of subverting U.S. democracy. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 06:08:22 GMT 6BHU6VM4QVPOLILOKB2OL3GWJU https://www.reuters.com/world/where-is-democracy-headed-2024-trump-may-have-final-word-2023-12-18/Mark Bendeich世界
